 Corporate Responsibility 
 Century is committed to the highest standards for corporate responsibility. We believe open dialogue with local communities and stakeholders will result in concern resolution and maximization of beneﬁts during project development and operation. 
 Our policies include active engagement with local Indigenous communities and businesses to seek their alignment and support. 
 Corporate Social Responsibility Committee 
 Century’s Corporate Social Responsibility Committee is responsible for oversight of engagement with Indigenous communities and businesses.  The committee reports directly to our board of directors.
